title: Capital Ship Piloting
wikitext:
'''Capital Ship Piloting'''

'''''Time Taken''': ''One round or longer.

'''''Specializations''': ''Type or class of capital ship — ''Imperial Star Destroyer, Victory Star Destroyer, Nebulon-B frigate.''

''Capital ship piloting ''covers the operation of large combat starships such as Imperial Star Destroyers, Carrac-class cruisers, Corellian Corvettes and Mon Cal cruisers. Capital ships normally require huge crews for efficient operation, and thus the skill emphasizes both quick reflexes and disciplined teamwork.

''Capital ship piloting ''can be used for a starship dodge — a "reaction skill" — to avoid enemy fire.
